card.name: Angel of Retribution
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter vengeance never glowed so bright nor sang so sweet.

card.name: Aven Trooper
card.property: Flying {2}{W}, Discard a card: Aven Trooper gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The very skies seethe with the aven's hatred for the Cabal.

card.name: Cleansing Meditation
card.property: Destroy all enchantments. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all enchantments, then return all cards in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield.

card.name: Equal Treatment
card.property: If any source would deal 1 or more damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals 2 damage to that permanent or player instead. Draw a card.

card.name: Floating Shield
card.property: Enchant creature As Floating Shield enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Floating Shield. Sacrifice Floating Shield: Target creature gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Frantic Purification
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. Madness {W} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By definition, madness ends in one of two ways: clarity . . . or death.

card.name: Hypochondria
card.property: {W}, Discard a card: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {W}, Sacrifice Hypochondria: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Major Teroh
card.property: Flying {3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Major Teroh: Exile all black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the holy wind that shall avenge the Cabal's victims."

card.name: Militant Monk
card.property: Vigilance {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Morningtide
card.property: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirits of the righteous shall rise into the sky. Even dirtwalkers will fly like aven." —Major Teroh

card.name: Mystic Familiar
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Familiar gets +1/+1 and has protection from black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They soar, and the mystics follow.

card.name: Pay No Heed
card.property: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

card.name: Possessed Nomad
card.property: Vigilance Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Nomad gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature."

card.name: Reborn Hero
card.property: Vigilance Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Reborn Hero has "When Reborn Hero dies, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, return Reborn Hero to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Spirit Flare
card.property: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, it deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls. Flashback—{1}{W}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Stern Judge
card.property: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Swamp they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How to punish the guilty is up to the Ancestor. Deciding who merits such punishment is up to me."

card.name: Strength of Isolation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has protection from black. Madness {W} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Teroh's Faithful
card.property: When Teroh's Faithful enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The light of reason follows them even into battle.

card.name: Teroh's Vanguard
card.property: Flash Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Teroh's Vanguard has "When Teroh's Vanguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain protection from black until end of turn."

card.name: Transcendence
card.property: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game. Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.)

card.name: Vengeful Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Exile X target attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Teroh dreams of his enemies' doom.

card.name: Alter Reality
card.property: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Ambassador Laquatus
card.property: {3}: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Aquamoeba
card.property: Discard a card: Switch Aquamoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Balshan Collaborator
card.property: Flying {B}: Balshan Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Power, gold, crackers—every bird has its price." —Chainer, dementia master

card.name: Breakthrough
card.property: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ideas came flooding in so fast that they couldn't all be contained.

card.name: Cephalid Aristocrat
card.property: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to tell the difference between the devious cephalids and the trustworthy ones. The trustworthy ones are dead.

card.name: Cephalid Illusionist
card.property: Whenever Cephalid Illusionist becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. {2}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Cephalid Sage
card.property: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Cephalid Sage has "When Cephalid Sage enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards."

card.name: Cephalid Snitch
card.property: Sacrifice Cephalid Snitch: Target creature loses protection from black until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cautious are wary of their enemies. The wise are also wary of their friends.

card.name: Cephalid Vandal
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a shred counter on Cephalid Vandal. Then put the top card of your library into your graveyard for each shred counter on Cephalid Vandal.

card.name: Churning Eddy
card.property: Return target creature and target land to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic is like the tide—both ebb, both flow, and both serve my whims." —Empress Llawan

card.name: Circular Logic
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Compulsion
Coral Net
card.property: Enchant green or white creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you discard a card."

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.property: Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: False Memories
card.property: Put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of the next end step, exile seven cards from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enemies will forget everything but their anguish." —Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Ghostly Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying. Discard a card: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hydromorph Guardian
card.property: {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Guardian: Counter target spell that targets a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In front of every strong leader is a pool of loyal bodyguards.

card.name: Hydromorph Gull
card.property: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Hydromorph Gull: Counter target spell that targets a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only kind of water that should fly through the air is rain." —Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Liquify
card.property: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 3 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Llawan, Cephalid Empress
card.property: When Llawan, Cephalid Empress enters the battlefield, return all blue creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Your opponents can't cast blue creature spells.

card.name: Obsessive Search
card.property: Draw a card. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The question strained his sanity. The answer snapped it in half.

card.name: Plagiarize
card.property: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Possessed Aven
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Aven gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target blue creature."

card.name: Retraced Image
card.property: Reveal a card in your hand, then put that card onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An army from a soldier, a flock from a bird, a school from a fish . . . a profit from an atrocity.

card.name: Skywing Aven
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Return Skywing Aven to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am as the wind that bears me: harsh yet gentle, fleeting yet ever-present. Together we fly beyond imagination."

card.name: Stupefying Touch
card.property: Enchant creature When Stupefying Touch enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature's activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just because your eyes are open doesn't mean you're awake.

card.name: Turbulent Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

card.name: Boneshard Slasher
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Boneshard Slasher gets +2/+2 and has "When Boneshard Slasher becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Cabal Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}. Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind." —Cabal Patriarch

card.name: Cabal Surgeon

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Clerics give up when their patients die. Can I help it if I'm more compassionate?"

card.name: Cabal Torturer
card.property: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Threshold — {3}{B}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Carrion Rats
card.property: Whenever Carrion Rats attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from their graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Rats assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just what I need—more competition." —Cabal grave robber

card.name: Carrion Wurm
card.property: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may exile three cards from their graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Wurm assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Since it eats only carrion, sometimes it needs to make some from scratch.

card.name: Chainer, Dementia Master
card.property: Nightmare creatures get +1/+1. {B}{B}{B}, Pay 3 life: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is black and is a Nightmare in addition to its other creature types. When Chainer, Dementia Master leaves the battlefield, exile all Nightmares.

card.name: Chainer's Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pits have their own form of mercy.

card.name: Crippling Fatigue
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Flashback—{1}{B}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Dawn of the Dead
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Faceless Butcher
card.property: When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher. When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Gloomdrifter
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Gloomdrifter has "When Gloomdrifter enters the battlefield, nonblack creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn."

card.name: Gravegouger
card.property: When Gravegouger enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. When Gravegouger leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Grotesque Hybrid
card.property: Whenever Grotesque Hybrid deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Discard a card: Grotesque Hybrid gains flying and protection from green and from white until end of turn.

card.name: Hypnox
card.property: Flying When Hypnox enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all cards from target opponent's hand. When Hypnox leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Ichorid
card.property: Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ichorid. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ichorid is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than Ichorid from your graveyard. If you do, return Ichorid to the battlefield.

card.name: Insidious Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Search your library for X cards. Then shuffle your library and put those cards on top of it in any order.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
card.property: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life. When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life. {B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

card.name: Last Laugh
card.property: Whenever a permanent other than Last Laugh is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Last Laugh deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. When no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Last Laugh.

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.property: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mind Sludge
card.property: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you get into the swamp, the swamp gets into you.

card.name: Mortal Combat
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crowd roared, the fighters bled, and the dead piled high in the pits. Only the Cabal could win.

card.name: Mortiphobia
Mutilate
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They appreciate my handiwork. I hear their joy in every scream." —Chainer, dementia master

card.name: Nantuko Shade
card.property: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the Nantuko only knew what awaits them beyond death, they would abandon all they hold dear." —Cabal Patriarch

card.name: Organ Grinder
card.property: {T}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Target player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It knows what makes you tick. It knows how to make the ticking stop.

card.name: Psychotic Haze
card.property: Psychotic Haze deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Putrid Imp
card.property: Discard a card: Putrid Imp gains flying until end of turn. Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Putrid Imp gets +1/+1 and can't block.

card.name: Rancid Earth
card.property: Destroy target land. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that land and Rancid Earth deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Restless Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

card.name: Shade's Form
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Shambling Swarm
card.property: When Shambling Swarm dies, distribute three -1/-1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each -1/-1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a -1/-1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's madness personified, it exists only to slaughter the innocent.

card.name: Sickening Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Patriarch dreams of vile plague.

card.name: Slithery Stalker
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) When Slithery Stalker enters the battlefield, exile target green or white creature an opponent controls. When Slithery Stalker leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Soul Scourge
card.property: Flying When Soul Scourge enters the battlefield, target player loses 3 life. When Soul Scourge leaves the battlefield, that player gains 3 life.

card.name: Strength of Lunacy
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has protection from white. Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Unhinge
card.property: Target player discards a card. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't let your mind wander—it might not come back." —Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Waste Away
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's insanity touched nearly every living thing—including viruses.

card.name: Zombie Trailblazer
card.property: Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn. Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

card.name: Accelerate
card.property: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Balthor the Stout
card.property: Other Barbarian creatures get +1/+1. {R}: Another target Barbarian creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like to think of him as concentrated barbarian." —Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Barbarian Outcast
card.property: When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Barbarian Outcast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We offer power to anyone willing to take it. Sadly, few are unburdened enough by their prejudices to accept." —Cabal surgeon

card.name: Crackling Club
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. Sacrifice Crackling Club: It deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Crazed Firecat
card.property: When Crazed Firecat enters the battlefield, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Put a +1/+1 counter on Crazed Firecat for each flip you won.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The longer it's caged, the madder it gets." —Firecat handler

card.name: Devastating Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards at random. Each player sacrifices X lands. Devastating Dreams deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kamahl dreams of storms of fire.

card.name: Enslaved Dwarf
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Enslaved Dwarf: Target black creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Captive dwarves always regain their freedom, either through escape or through a desperate, fiery death.

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.property: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Flaming Gambit
card.property: Flaming Gambit deals X damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller may choose a creature they control and have Flaming Gambit deal that damage to it instead. Flashback {X}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Flash of Defiance
card.property: Green creatures and white creatures can't block this turn. Flashback—{1}{R}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Grim Lavamancer
card.property: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

card.name: Hell-Bent Raider
card.property: First strike, haste Discard a card at random: Hell-Bent Raider gains protection from white until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He doesn't slow until his spear is weighted with corpses.

card.name: Kamahl's Sledge
card.property: Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to target creature. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to that creature and 4 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Longhorn Firebeast
card.property: When Longhorn Firebeast enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 5 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Longhorn Firebeast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blast can fuse armor to bone, leaving skeletons that glint brightly in the sun.

card.name: Overmaster
card.property: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn can't be countered. Draw a card.

card.name: Pardic Arsonist
card.property: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Pardic Arsonist has "When Pardic Arsonist enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Otaria's epidemic of insanity didn't affect certain barbarians—but no one noticed.

card.name: Pardic Collaborator
card.property: First strike {B}: Pardic Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've been taught that strength is everything. So how can an alliance with the strongest be a betrayal?"

card.name: Pardic Lancer
card.property: Discard a card at random: Pardic Lancer gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He gets to the point right away.

card.name: Petradon
card.property: When Petradon enters the battlefield, exile two target lands. When Petradon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control. {R}: Petradon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Petravark
card.property: When Petravark enters the battlefield, exile target land. When Petravark leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Pitchstone Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever you discard a card, you may sacrifice Pitchstone Wall. If you do, return the discarded card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its material may not be precious, but the minds it protects are.

card.name: Possessed Barbarian
card.property: First strike Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Barbarian gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target red creature."

card.name: Pyromania
Radiate
card.property: Choose target instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single permanent or player. Copy that spell for each other permanent or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those permanents and players.

card.name: Skullscorch
card.property: Target player discards two cards at random unless that player has Skullscorch deal 4 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good whack on the head usually has the same effect." —Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Sonic Seizure
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random. Sonic Seizure deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Temporary Insanity
card.property: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Violent Eruption
card.property: Violent Eruption deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Madness {1}{R}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Acorn Harvest
card.property: Create two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens. Flashback—{1}{G}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Anurid Scavenger
card.property: Protection from black At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Anurid Scavenger unless you put a card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Arrogant Wurm
card.property: Trample Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

card.name: Basking Rootwalla
Centaur Chieftain
card.property: Haste Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Centaur Chieftain has "When Centaur Chieftain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn."

card.name: Centaur Veteran
card.property: Trample {G}, Discard a card: Regenerate Centaur Veteran.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wears his scars like badges of honor, warning his foes that he's not easily defeated.

card.name: Dwell on the Past
card.property: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: None can find what hasn't been lost. —Nantuko teaching

card.name: Far Wanderings
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gurzigost
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gurzigost unless you put two cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. {G}{G}, Discard a card: You may have Gurzigost assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Insist
card.property: The next creature spell you cast this turn can't be countered. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finesse is no match for brute force." —Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Invigorating Falls
card.property: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Krosan druids do not fear death, for they know that nature will only prosper from their passing.

card.name: Krosan Constrictor
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {T}: Target black creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a slithering, coldblooded menace. I've gotta respect that." —Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Krosan Restorer
card.property: {T}: Untap target land. Threshold — {T}: Untap up to three target lands. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Blightcutter
card.property: Protection from black Threshold — Nantuko Blightcutter gets +1/+1 for each black permanent your opponents control as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Calmer
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Nantuko Calmer: Destroy target enchantment. Threshold — Nantuko Calmer gets +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Cultivator
card.property: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

card.name: Narcissism
card.property: {G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Nostalgic Dreams
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.

card.name: Parallel Evolution
card.property: For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature. Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Possessed Centaur
card.property: Trample Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Centaur gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature."

card.name: Seton's Scout
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Threshold — Seton's Scout gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Cabal Coffers
card.property: {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

card.name: Tainted Field
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Isle
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Peak
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tainted Wood
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.
